name: Barista (jinxedbyte)
description:
Becoma a barista in my french cafe and serve customers with delicous coffee.

What is your high-score? Let me know in the comments.

Submission to Trijam 120 - the 3 hour game jam

Theme: Coffee

Gameplay:

Select a full cup and then click onto the request bubble to score.

Refill the empty cup. Place cup onto empty saucer. Brew coffee.

Assets used:

  • Art: myself using Aseprite (CGA1 High palette)
  • Font "FFF Forward" from https://www.1001fonts.com/pixel-fonts.html
  • Music: YouTube AudioLibrary "Parisian Cafe - Aaron Kenny"
  • Sound: Pour water into coffee cup 
  • Sound: coffemachine brewing - actions
  • Sound: coffee slurp 2
  • Sound: Cup and Saucer
